,,, 2.4GHz Power Amplifier IC;Microsemi;LX5510;MSC, 5510, 442FE;1;InGaP/GaAs HBT;16-pin MLPQ;3 mm x 3 mm; |802dot11_protocols = abg |defaulip = 192.168.0.30 |defaultlogin = admin |defaultpass = |defaultssid = |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = |manuf = Global Sun |manuf_model = WL AP 2554 RA1 |manuf_rev = |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = |availability = |eoldate = |fccapprovdate = 12/23/2004 |estreldate = |estprice = |upc = 790069273384 |ean = |dx_sku = |newegg = |asin = B0006TIA0M |asin_country = |asin2 = |asin_country2 = |countrymanuf = Taiwan, China |buttons = |led = |dimensions = |weight = |wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1cpu = true |rad1chip2 = Atheros;AR5112A;AR5112A-00, CN4623.00C, 3104, KOREA; |rad1oui = |rad1_ant_conn = none |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11a/b/g |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1a = 54 |rad1freq = 2.4 or 5 }}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "WL AP 2554 RA1" and "HW Rev A3" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos.
"WL AP 2554 RA1-B10" and "Rev V1.0" is silkscreened on (at least one) production model board. ===Firmware notes=== *The firmware is compressed with arj *OS: ThreadX JADE/Green Hills Version G4.0.4.0 *ar531x, 3.0.1.12, 18:00, 08 Dec, 2004, Build 1048 (dgl3420_firmware_100.bin) ===Probable used PSU(s)=== The power supply which seems to be bundled with US sold units looks to be a '''JENTEC''' JTA0302A. The connector is smaller than usual.. {{hasPowerSupply |brand = JENTEC |model = JTA0302A |input_v=100-120 |input_a=0.5 |input_c=AC |input_hz=50-60 |input_conn=NEMA 1-15P |output_v=5 |output_a=2 |output_c=DC |output_conn=barrel |countrymanuf = China |style=small, straight }} ==JTAG-Serial Info== ===Serial=== ====Serial Pinouts==== It's on the back of the unit, presumably. Tx seems to be the large used pad next to the two large grounded pads - both of which are somewhat below the power connector. The output doesn't appear to be particularly useful.. [http://www.dd-wrt.com/forum/viewtopic.php?p=637894&sid=bc09ec3ce1ea32cefedf27cd172771fa a trait] [http://users.atw.hu/balubati/website_files/surecom/surecom.html which may] [https://forum.openwrt.org/viewtopic.php?id=14205 be shared with] other '''Global Sun''' AR231x + ThreadX devices.. ===Boot log=== 
aaa
bbb
EZ
